parameters.name: ScanPath
parameters.description: The information about the scan path that is required for a custom scan.

parameters.name: ScanType
parameters.description:
The type of the virus scan. Valid values:

*   **system**: system scan.
*   **user**: custom scan.

parameters.name: SelectionKey
parameters.description:
The key that stores the asset information.

> You can call the [GetAssetSelectionConfig](~~GetAssetSelectionConfig~~) operation to obtain the key value.
